column4: hi @ all, what should i do if ubuntu 8.10 didnt install the boot part, my pc boots right up to vista :( not a nice up down menu like 8.04 had :(
whats the chance of me messing up my vista partition in this procedure ?
if u dont know what u are doing ... high
i ll give it a shot :)
alright, that didnt work :) now not even vista boots :)
first thing that is wrong is ubuntu not automaticly creating that like in 8.04 if that was there, i wouldnt be stuck

i was tryin to assign / to the ext3 partition of ubuntu, then swap is swap of corse and the vista partition is now set as not used, but if i enable mount point windows, nothing can be written ... error
hmmm i cannot guide u to fix that ... u need someone with knowledge to fix it
i guess i can just kiss my vista partition good bye and just format the whole deal :(
i'm sorry :S, 'boot problems' needs some knowledge to be fixed
